title: 什么方法可以修改合成表
author: zdyzdyzdyzdyzdy
txt_content: 求添加修改合成表的方法，且尽量是原版

replies.author: hqqaazz
replies.txt_content:
如果你是指用工作台的话，没办法，只能用mod
但是用指令方块可以用发射器来代替工作台，比如这样：
execute @p ~ ~ ~ testforblock ~ ~-1 ~ minecraft:dropper 1 {Items:[{Slot:0b,id:minecraft:string,Count:1b},{Slot:1b,id:minecraft:string,Count:1b},{Slot:2b,id:minecraft:string,Count:1b},{Slot:3b,id:minecraft:string,Count:1b},{Slot:4b,id:minecraft:string,Count:1b},{Slot:5b,id:minecraft:string,Count:1b},{Slot:6b,id:minecraft:string,Count:1b},{Slot:7b,id:minecraft:string,Count:1b},{Slot:8b,id:minecraft:string,Count:1b}]}复制代码execute @p ~ ~ ~ blockdata ~ ~-1 ~ {Items:[{Slot:4b,id:minecraft:web,Count:1b}]}复制代码

replies.author: 疯狂的右手
replies.txt_content: 诶嘿，虽然有点笨。但是可以用RPG插件或者npc插件加入新的合成公式，，，，如果你要禁止合成一个东西的话 用BANitem插件ban掉也好{:10_492:}
